title: How do I get back to the NA boards
body: I cant view the NA boards for some reason, changing the region seems to make no difference.  Is there a way to get back there, without making an NA league account? (which will disappear as never played) and then an NA boards acct (will go when the league acct goes).

replies.body:
Hey there,

Simply visiting https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/ should take you to the NA boards, I am able to access them without issue.
